Could each one who proposes to be a believer in the message for this time multiply himself and his means a thousandfold, we as a people should 


                                      -6- 

not be able by our good deeds to retrieve the losses we have sustained on account of our neglect of duty during the last 25 years. The guilt of the past is resting upon us, even upon all the camp of Israel. A complete reformation is now needed in all our institutions. We must arouse, and by the Lord's help strive to put away the evils now existing, and to redeem the time, if possible.
